mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM shipManage sm where 1=1
and DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(#{dataStr}, '%Y-%m-%d'),sm.anchor_date)>=0 and DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(#{dataStr}, '%Y-%m-%d'),sm.weigh_date)<=0
and DATEDIFF(NOW(),sm.anchor_date)>=0 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),sm.weigh_date)<=0
AND sm.name=#{name}
select name,min(mao_date) min,max(mao_date) max from tab_anchorage_res t GROUP BY name;
select mao_date from tab_anchorage_res t where name=#{name} ORDER by mao_date
mapper.insert: INSERT into tab_anchorage( name,anchor_date ,weigh_date ,anchor_days ,nameAndDate ) values (#{name},#{anchor_date},#{weigh_date},#{anchor_days},#{nameAndDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY update anchor_date=#{anchor_date}, weigh_date=#{weigh_date}, anchor_days=#{anchor_days}

insert into shipmanage (access_port_date,name,length,tonnage,anchor_date,target_port,weigh_date,anchor_days,telephone,break_rules,nameAndDate) select (CASE WHEN t.mao_date is NULL THEN '1900-1-1' ELSE t.mao_date END) mao_date1, t.name, -- length,tonnage,paomao_date,-- qimao_date,mao_days,telephone,break_rules (CASE WHEN ts.length is NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE ts.length END) length1, (CASE WHEN ts.tonnage is NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE ts.tonnage END) tonnage1, (CASE WHEN t.paomao_date is NULL THEN '1900-1-1' ELSE t.paomao_date END) paomao_date1, (CASE WHEN t.target_port is NULL THEN '-' ELSE t.target_port END) target_port1, (CASE WHEN t.qimao_date is NULL THEN '1900-1-1' ELSE t.qimao_date END) qimao_date1, (CASE WHEN t.mao_days is NULL THEN 0 ELSE t.mao_days END) mao_days1, (CASE WHEN ts.telephone is NULL THEN '-' ELSE ts.telephone END) telephone1, (CASE WHEN ts.break_rules is NULL THEN '-' ELSE ts.break_rules END) break_rules1, t.nameAndDate
FROM (select tm.*,tp.target_port,tp.mao_date from (select name,anchor_date paomao_date,weigh_date qimao_date,anchor_days mao_days,nameAndDate from tab_anchorage t ) tm left JOIN tab_wharfs tp on tm.name=tp.name and (tm.qimao_date=tp.mao_date or tm.qimao_date+1=tp.mao_date) ) t LEFT JOIN tab_vessels ts on t.name=ts.name ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE access_port_date = (CASE WHEN t.mao_date is NULL THEN '1900-1-1' ELSE t.mao_date END), length = (CASE WHEN ts.length is NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE ts.length END), tonnage = (CASE WHEN ts.tonnage is NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE ts.tonnage END) , telephone = (CASE WHEN ts.telephone is NULL THEN '-' ELSE ts.telephone END), break_rules = (CASE WHEN ts.break_rules is NULL THEN '-' ELSE ts.break_rules END), anchor_date = (CASE WHEN t.paomao_date is NULL THEN '1900-1-1' ELSE t.paomao_date END), target_port = (CASE WHEN t.target_port is NULL THEN '-' ELSE t.target_port END), weigh_date = (CASE WHEN t.qimao_date is NULL THEN '1900-1-1' ELSE t.qimao_date END), anchor_days =(CASE WHEN t.mao_days is NULL THEN 0 ELSE t.mao_days END)
